results.title: Brave
results.brief_description: Brave is set in the mystical Scottish Highlands, where Mérida is the princess of a kingdom ruled by King Fergus and Queen Elinor. An unruly daughter and an accomplished archer, Mérida one day defies a sacred custom of the land and inadvertently brings turmoil to the kingdom. In an attempt to set things right, Mérida seeks out an eccentric old Wise Woman and is granted an ill-fated wish. Also figuring into Mérida’s quest — and serving as comic relief — are the kingdom’s three lords: the enormous Lord MacGuffin, the surly Lord Macintosh, and the disagreeable Lord Dingwall.
results.description: Brave is set in the mystical Scottish Highlands, where Mérida is the princess of a kingdom ruled by King Fergus and Queen Elinor. In an attempt to set things right, Mérida seeks out an eccentric old Wise Woman and is granted an ill-fated wish. results.title: Bran Nue Dae
results.creator_credit: MIFF Premiere Fund, Reg Cribb and Rachel Perkins
results.brief_description: In the Summer of 1965 a young man is filled with the life of the idyllic old pearling port Broome - fishing, hanging out with his mates and his girl. However his mother returns him to the religious mission for further schooling. After being punished for an act of youthful rebellion, he runs away from the mission on a journey that ultimately leads him back home.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: MIFF Premiere Fund, Reg Cribb and Rachel Perkins

However his mother returns him to the religious mission for further schooling. After being punished for an act of youthful rebellion, he runs away from the mission on a journey that ultimately leads him back home.

results.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
results.brief_description: Gary Oldman, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Winona Ryder and Keanu Reeves star in Francis Ford Coppola’s adaptation of Bram Stoker’s Dracula. Featuring iconic performances, imaginative costumes and breathtaking cinematography, Coppola’s version breathed new life into the legendary tale.

constellations_other.name: Blood, shot
constellations_other.description: The fake blood used by costume designer Edie Kurzer in Judy & Punch is connected to a long, bloody lineage in cinema.

results.description: When Dracula leaves the captive Jonathan Harker and Transylvania for London in search of Mina Harker—the spitting image of Dracula’s long-dead wife, Elisabeta—obsessed vampire hunter, Dr. Van Helsing sets out to end the madness.
description_for_label: When Dracula leaves the captive Jonathan Harker and Transylvania for London in search of Mina Harker—the spitting image of Dracula’s long-dead wife, Elisabeta—obsessed vampire hunter, Dr. Van Helsing sets out to end the madness.

results.title: Boyz n the Hood
results.brief_description: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.

constellations_other.name: Rodney King LA Riots
constellations_other.description: The brutal beating of Rodney King by the LAPD was caught on amateur videotape and became what is arguably the first video of police brutality to go viral before the internet. It was a catalyst for the 1992 LA riots, which has influenced media ever since.

results.description: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.
description_for_label: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.

results.title: Boyhood
results.brief_description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

results.title: Booksmart
results.creator_credit: Annapurna Pictures, Gloria Sanchez Productions, Katie Silberman, Olivia Wilde, Chelsea Barnard, Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Byron, Megan Ellison, David Distenfeld and April Napier
results.brief_description: Two academic teenage superstars realize, on the eve of their high school graduation, that they should have worked less and played more. Determined to never fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Annapurna Pictures, Gloria Sanchez Productions, Katie Silberman, Olivia Wilde, Chelsea Barnard, Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Byron, Megan Ellison, David Distenfeld and April Napier

results.title: Bombshell
results.creator_credit: Norie Varga, Margaret Riley, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Beth Kono, Aaron L. Gilbert, Robert Graf, A.J. Dix, Mark Ricker, Charlize Theron, Jay Roach, Colleen Atwood, Endeavor Content, Lionsgate, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Annapurna Pictures, Bron Studios, Denver and Delilah Productions and Lighthouse Management + Media
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: Bombshell is a revealing look inside the most powerful and controversial media empire of all time; and the explosive story of the women who brought down the infamous man who created it.

constellations_other.name: Elevator Operator: Up and down, the on-screen gift of elevators
constellations_other.description: Inspired by Courtney Barnett playing an elevator operator in her hit song of the same name, we look at how they're used on-screen for comedy, drama and suspense, with the small, confined boxes forcing characters to physically confront each other.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Norie Varga, Margaret Riley, Charles Randolph, Michelle Graham, Beth Kono, Aaron L. Gilbert, Robert Graf, A.J. Dix, Mark Ricker, Charlize Theron, Jay Roach, Colleen Atwood, Endeavor Content, Lionsgate, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Annapurna Pictures, Bron Studios, Denver and Delilah Productions and Lighthouse Management + Media

results.title: BoJack Horseman
results.brief_description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

results.description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

results.title: Bluey
results.brief_description: Bluey is an inexhaustible six year-old Blue Heeler dog, who loves to play and turns everyday family life into extraordinary adventures, developing her imagination as well as her mental, physical and emotional resilience.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherhead’s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.

constellations_other.name: Native Tongue
constellations_other.description: The lead single off her album of the same name, 'Native Tongue' saw artist Mo'Ju explore cultural identity through music, movement and striking visuals.

results.description: Bluey is an inexhaustible six year-old Blue Heeler dog, who loves to play and turns everyday family life into extraordinary adventures, developing her imagination as well as her mental, physical and emotional resilience.

results.title: Blue Planet II
results.creator_credit: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.brief_description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.creator_credit_for_label: BBC Natural History Unit, BBC and Mark Brownlow
results.description: There is nowhere more powerful and unforgiving yet more beautiful and compelling than the ocean. Join us and explore the greatest yet least known parts of our planet.
